数据类型 - map(key:value)

  1. $colors:(light:#ffffff,dark:#000000)
  2. length($colors) -> 2
  3. map-get($colors,dark) -> #000000
  4. map-get($colors,light) -> #ffffff
  5. map-keys($colors) -> ('ligth','dark')
  6. map-values($colors) -> ($ffffff,#000000)
  7. map-has-key($colors,light) -> true
  8. map-has-key($colors,red) -> false
  9. map-merge($colors,(light-gray:#e5e5e5)) -> (light:#ffffff,dark:#000000,light-gray:#e5e5e5)
  10. map-remove($colors,light,dark) -> (light-gray:#e5e5e5)
